title: SOLD: 1906 Fred Wagner Chicago Cubs Real Photo PC
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1906 Fred Wagner Chicago Cubs Real Photo PC
posts.post_content:
Very rare Wagner Studio 1906 real photo postcard of the pennant winning Cubs.  Mordecai Brown, Tinker, Evers and Chance included.  Just four graded by SGC.    Email or PM if interested.  

[url=https://flic.kr/p/q2r2UM][img]https://c1.staticflickr.com/8/7409/15768763153_c88f7b6c92_z.jpg[/img][/url]
